```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

### What to do for Week 13s after class ends^[For grading.]

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "
#4682b4"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "
#4682b4"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"eCampus?" = c(checked, 
               unchecked),

Description = c("Submit problems 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, and 13 in Chapter 10.",
               "Take a look at jamovi."),

Location = c("[Link](/assignment/13-homeworks/#assignment-1)",
             "[Link](/lesson/13-lesson/#jamovi-1)")
)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'clc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "30em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "10em")
```
